channel.title: Improbable expectations
channel.description: My personal blog about a statistician masquerading as a full-stack data scientist

item.title: Modeling domain-specific constraints with xgboost
item.dc:creator: David Dai
item.description: Incorporating domain knowledge from subject matter experts is critical for building useful models. As statistician George Box said, *"All models are wrong, but some are useful."* How useful our models are depend critically on how well we apply domain knowledge to extract the signal from the noise.

item.title: Optimizing ED Nurse Assignment
item.dc:creator: David Dai and Neal Kaw
item.description: Implementing an optimization tool for ED nurse assignment.
